meanings.sent1: The two circles were concentric, sharing the same middle point.
meanings.sent2: The target had concentric rings, all centered around one point.
meanings.sent3: The concentric cupcakes were a hit at the party, each with a surprise center.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts and emotions were concentric, revolving around a single idea.
meanings.sent5: The concentric layers of the painting created a mesmerizing effect.

meanings.sent1: The wheels on the car were concentric, all rotating around the same axis.
meanings.sent2: The gears meshed perfectly, forming a set of concentric circles.
meanings.sent3: The concentric planets in the sci-fi movie orbited a giant space donut.
meanings.sent4: His arguments were concentric, all pointing towards the same conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The concentric arrangement of the solar system is fascinating to study.

meanings.sent1: The Russian dolls were concentric, fitting perfectly inside each other.
meanings.sent2: The tree rings showed concentric circles, indicating its age.
meanings.sent3: The concentric hula hoops at the circus made the audience cheer.
meanings.sent4: The concentric waves in the pond spread out in perfect circles.
meanings.sent5: The concentric layers of the rock formation revealed its history.
